ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats on the RBB, it rocks. I might have the opportunity to swap mine for a CoF soon. What do you think is a better combo?  RBB/HBC or CoF/TBB? Elwyn
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats on the RBB, it rocks.
I might have the opportunity to swap mine for a CoF soon.
What do you think is a better combo? RBB/HBC or CoF/TBB?


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr


P.S. forgive the acronyms.
RBB = runed bolster belt
HBC = hooded black cloak
CoF = cloak of flames
TBB = thick banded belt


-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 11:35 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


p.s. no i didn't get the greaves, but i did get an RBB =)
